short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks prices of products on various Amazon marketplaces and provides notifications on price drops.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you track the prices of products on various Amazon marketplaces and receive notifications when prices drop with a user-friendly tool for saving money while shopping on Amazon.

Features:
1: Multi-Marketplace Support: Tracks prices on a wide range of Amazon domains.
2: Easy Product Tracking
3: Automatic Price Checks.
4: Price Drop Notifications.
5: Stylish Popup Display.
6: Badge Icon.
7: Implemented rate limiting to avoid overloading Amazon's servers.

If you have any questions or requests regarding the extension please contact me.
if this extension helped you save some money please do not forget to leave a positive review :)


*** "Disclaimer: This Chrome extension may contain affiliate links. If you make a purchase through these links, we may earn a small commission at no additional cost to you. Thank you for supporting our work!"
